title: (Mon Early Bird) Chris Janson Addressed the Lunchbox Feud + Brings In His Full Band + Lunchbox Responds To Listener Who Offered Him A Movie Role + Mailbag: Husband Said Nanny’s Name in His Sleep
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Chris Janson Addressed the Lunchbox Feud + Brings In His Full Band + Lunchbox Responds To Listener Who Offered Him A Movie Role + Mailbag: Husband Said Nanny’s Name in His Sleep
description:
Chris Janson stops by to perform some hits and songs from his new album. He also addresses the beef between him and Lunchbox and it gets awkward! Amy is just a day away from leaving for Hollywood to be in a movie. Lunchbox finally responds to the listener who offered him a role in her short film. A listener needs advice on if she should address her husband saying their nanny’s name in his sleep.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
